title: Mio Bistro and Catering
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian-Mediterranean bistro. Most dishes are vegetarian from antipasti, salad, and pasta. The mio-brot (doner) is vegan as is the house-made pastes that come with it. Try the vegan pizza and be sure to tell the staff if you are vegan when ordering.
